string.text: Well, you are a weakling Marked One ... of no use to us here ... So you'll never get thanks from us. That's my thanks to you ... now Fuck Off!!!
Not bad, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. shot some mutants did you? !, not that big a deal, really .... so if you want to go through - you still have to pay ... HaHaHa!!!
Excellent, Marked One, you really helped us greatly. We will assume that you paid for your pass. You can proceed to Rostock if you like ...
Allow them to get closer, so that no one is left behind. I shoot first - then you follow.
S.T.A.L.K.E.R. .. you are in Duty controlled territory now ... any act of aggression will be dealt with swiftly, and severely ...
Everyone! Come to the Duty outpost at the Dump. A wave of Mutants are attacking from the direction of the Dark Valley. Anyone who manages to take one down - is guaranteed thanks from us ...
Don't mess around here S.T.A.L.K.E.R. ... cause a ruckus, and Duty will make sure you don't live to see another day .... you've been warned!
Well done, men ... we overcame them. All the rest regroup, and loot the corpses ... and you, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. come here and let's have a chat.

To all S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s .. this is the Commander of the Neutral party ... we drove the Bandits out of the Carpark, but there will be another attack soon .... please provide backup ... we need help .... please!!!!
